name: Path's Path Back to Relevancy
description:
Path. 

That's a name you haven't heard in a long time.

Download file PatrickTenHag.rar dan GameJam2022.rar. Setelah itu, extract rar nya dan masukkan isi PatrickTenHag.rar ke dalam folder hasil extract tersebut. Setelah itu, jalankan PatrickTenHag.exe JANGAN GUNAKAN "GameJam2022.exe"

Do you remember?

Some things from the past are still relevant. But not Path.

So, which Path will you choose? The Path who gave up, failed, and left in the dust? Or the Path that persists, resurrect, and return to relevancy?

The choice is yours.

===============================================================

The Dark Souls Equivalent of Sudoku!

Help Patrick Ten Hag, or Path to choose the right path using your unsolved Sudoku Map (Hold Q Button.)
Every run has different path to the Finish Point, 
find the correct one !

NTC Submission for BGDJam2022

Player Involved: Jamiel (8): Attacking Mid Fielder Viel (9): Striker Sachio (1): Sweeper Keeper Shannon (5): Left Offensive Full Back Della (7): Left Inverted Winger

Controls:

WASD: Move
Hold Q: Open Map
Spacebar: Dash
E: Interact
ESC: Pause

Credits:

NTC 

Isaiah Jamiel - Dev & Audio
Steven Nataniel - Dev
Albert Sachio - Stage Assets
Della Florine - Illustration
Madeline Shannon - Character Sprite & Stage Assets

All original assets are made within the jam duration.
